item.description: Privacy Policy of Grant Labs LLC Grant Labs LLC operates the Grant app, which provides the SERVICE. This page is used to inform website and app users regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service, the Grant app. If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy.

Welcome to Grant Labs LLC These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Grant Labs LLC’s Website.
